short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces ordinary text with a Boston accent.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
BostonText converts ordinary text on the web pages you visit into the words that a true Bostonian would say

EXAMPLES: 
"Car Park" -> "Cah Pahk"
"Hot Body" -> "Hat Bady"
"Shark" -> "Shahk"
...among many others! Have fun!
